revised_title: Awards and Achievements in Science: Royal Society Anniversary Address 1976
tldr: The President of the Royal Society, Lord Todd, delivers the anniversary address highlighting the achievements and contributions of various scientists in different fields. The address mentions the recipients of the Royal Society's prestigious awards, including Dorothy Hodgkin, I. Prigogine, J. L. Gowans, A. Walsh, R. E. Richards, Charlotte Auerbach, D. G. Kendall, S. W. Hawking, and G. H. Retchings. The address covers a wide range of scientific disciplines, from chemistry and physics to biology and mathematics.
